MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area or Motherwell. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm to complete repair work on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:25pm on 2nd February 2021.
